mapper.select: select * from task where pro_id = #{pro_id} order by st_dt, end_dt
select * from task where pro_id = #{pro_id} and task_id in (select task_id from pro_task where emp_id = #{emp_id}) order by st_dt, end_dt

select * from task where task_id in (select task_id from pro_task where pro_id = #{pro_id} and emp_id = #{emp_id} and pa_task_id is not null) and to_number(to_char(trunc(st_dt, 'iw'),'WW')) <= to_number(to_char(trunc(sysdate, 'iw'),'WW')) and to_number(to_char(trunc(end_dt, 'iw'),'WW')) >= to_number(to_char(trunc(sysdate, 'iw'),'WW')) order by st_dt, end_dt

select * from task where task_id in (select task_id from pro_task where pro_id = #{pro_id} and emp_id = #{emp_id} and pa_task_id is not null) and end_dt <= trunc(sysdate, 'iw') and per < 100 order by st_dt, end_dt
